scripts.audit: npm audit & npm run exec -- npm audit
scripts.audit:fix: npm audit fix & npm run exec -- npm audit fix
scripts.clean-install-packages: npm run exec -- npm ci & npm ci
scripts.dist-tags: npm run exec -- npm dist-tag ls
scripts.install-packages: npm run exec -- npm install & npm install
scripts.update-latest-dist-tags: npm run exec for /f "usebackq" %a in (`npm view . name`) do @for /f "usebackq" %b in (`npm view . dist-tags.next`) do @npm dist-tag add %a@%b
